note.previous: , bhikkhave, abhiññāya dasa dhammā bhāvetabbā. Katame dasa? Aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, sabbaloke anabhiratasaññā, aṭṭhikasaññā, puḷavakasaññā

note.original: (upasamāya) (sī. syā. pī.) aññesaṃ pana nipātānaṃ pariyosāne idaṃ padaṃ na dissati
(upasamāya) (sī. syā. pī.) aññesaṃ pana nipātānaṃ pariyosāne idaṃ padaṃ na dissati
